articles.title: 'The mother of all bubbles' in the US is sucking money away from the rest of the world, market expert says - Fortune
articles.description: "Awe of 'American exceptionalism' in markets has now gone too far," said Ruchir Sharma, chair of Rockefeller International.

articles.author: Aleksandra Michalska, Reuters
articles.title: New York museum unveils 'Apex' — an almost complete stegosaurus - KSL.com
articles.description: The American Museum of Natural History is revealing one of the most complete specimens ever discovered of the stegosaurus, known for the upright plates on its back and a spiky tail.
